name: chemical
description:
We are in the underground facilities of a hostile race. It is still unknown in which galaxy the party will take place.

There are some guards who want to prevent you from going deeper. Or did you actually want to get out?

But not all paths are immediately accessible. There are some puzzles waiting, not all of which can be solved with a weapon.

At the moment the game has basic functions of a first-person game. Control and shooting with mouse and WASD keys, sprint (SHIFT), action key (E), jump (SPACE), simple inventory system (TAB), pause (P).
